channel.title: I cant get a no-ip to work!
channel.description: Ok i have a modem so im pretty sure i don't need to port forward and i have the no-ip DUC a host ip (exorce.no-ip.org) and i can log in using that and when i try to post it on the serverstatus list it says the server is offline. I am running the server too. PLZ HELP! [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Read the rules, this topic is for the development process of servers and to help other people with their problems in development.[/center]
